title: Giro d’Italia Stage 18: Merlier Fends Off Late-Charging Milan, Pogačar Cruises Onward in Pink Parade
content:
Pogačar and the GC contenders hit snooze in a 'by the numbers' sprint stage ahead of Giro's final mountain assault Friday and Saturday.
